name: Flush Force
description:
A fish's life long career as a systems programmer has come up dry. With no other choice, they must sign up for the world's most popular rideshare app, Flush Force, as a driver. Pick up passengers and drop them off at their destinations before you run out of toilet fuel, or you won't be able to buy any food! It's time to pay the price!

controls:

wasd - move toilet car
